channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DC

item.title: Report I-2022100143
item.description:
Report I-2022100143

Identified by scraper @ 2023-04-19T21:44:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2022-05-31
  • City: WASHINGTON
  • State: DC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY DISTRIBUTION LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During initial unloading operation fitting at rear hose connection cracked causing small release. Unloading stopped, fitting replaced and delivery complete without further incident.
